pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Utility spell that dismisses (kills) all of your nearby summons. Does not provide any spell XP.$(br)$(l)Magical School:$() None$(br)$(l)Mana Cost:$() 1$(br)$(l)Cooldown:$() 1 seconds$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/opaline_scepter)Opaline Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/iridescent_scepter)Iridescent Scepter$(), $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepters/lustrous_scepter)Lustrous Scepter$()$(br)$(l)Tier:$() 1
